## MapFunc type

Function to be executed for each item in a map operation

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MapFunc<TInput, TOutput, Logger extends DurableLogger> = (
  context: DurableContext<Logger>,
  item: TInput,
  index: number,
  array: TInput[],
) => Promise<TOutput>;
```

**References:** [DurableLogger](./durable-execution-sdk-js.durablelogger.md)<!-- -->, [DurableContext](./durable-execution-sdk-js.durablecontext.md)
